title: Teenager arrested in North Charleston shooting of 7-year-old child
content:
North Charleston police jailed a teenager Sunday they believe shot a 7-year-old child in the leg last week on Florida Avenue.
Tyrell Lamont Smith, 17, has been charged with assault and battery of a high and aggravated nature, and possession of a firearm during a violent crime. His bail for both crimes was set at $300,000.
On Jan. 2, a young boy was riding his bicycle around 11:30 p.m. with his mother following in a car.
Officers responded to a shooting incident and found the boy and mother in the car. The boy had suffered a bullet wound to his right leg.
Police said the child’s injuries were not life threatening.
